Tabs router

Each tab has its own route associated. Clicking on a tab initiates a route change.

If selected-tab-id is not explicitly specified, it is recognized from the current state if possible.

Particular tab routing may be customized through xui-tab-router directive, see the source code for the second tab.

External control buttons

These buttons show that it's possible to modify the state (i.e. url) externally and the tabs respect the state change.
